description: Explore the transformative applications of blockchain technology in enhancing land registries worldwide. Learn about initiatives and successes in countries like Central Africa, Sweden, Georgia, and India, where blockchain is being utilized to improve transparency, security, and efficiency in land titling and registry management.
keywords: Blockchain, land registry, Central Africa, Sweden, Georgia, India, land titling, technology, security, transparency, efficiency
title: Exploring Blockchain Applications in Global Land Registries
